title: 44-Perch Land with House for Sale in Katunayake
details:
A 44-perch well maintained land with a house for sale in Katunayake. The property is situated just in Katunayake town and about 30 yards away from the Colombo - Negombo main road less than 3 minutes drive to Colombo Katunayake International Airport.

House consist of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious living & dining, Kitchen, pantry, spacious garage and servant toilet.
Well water and tap water.
Clear deeds for financing.
Ideal residential area with good neighborhood.
Price is negotiable.
